entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High 11.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 then to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
